mapper.insert: insert into project_member(userid, username, userpwd, email, address, joindate, approval_status, approval_key) values(#{userid},#{username},#{userpwd},#{email},#{address},now(),#{approval_status},#{approval_key})
mapper.select: select userid, username, userpwd, email, address, joindate from project_member order by joindate
select count(*) from project_member where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from project_member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update project_member set userpwd = #{userpwd} where userid = #{userid}
